response: "{ \"title\": \"Hard: Maximum Sum of Three Elements\", \"description\": \"Given an array of integers, find the maximum sum that can be obtained by adding three distinct elements from the array.\\n\\n#### Function Signature\\n```python\\ndef max_sum(arr: list[int)) -> int:\\n```\\n\\n#### Input\\n- `arr` (list[int]): A list of integers.\\n\\n#### Output\\n- Returns the maximum sum of three distinct elements that can be obtained from the input list.\\n\", \"code\": \"\\nimport heapq\\n\\ndef max_sum(arr: list[int]) -> int:\\n    arr = sorted(set(arr))\\n    return sum(heapq.nlargest(3, arr))\\n\\n\", \"tests\": [\"assert max_sum([-1, 2, -3, 3, 0, 1, 7]) == 9\", \"assert max_sum([1, 2, 3, 4, 5]) == 9\", \"assert max_sum([10]) == 10\"] }"
